content:
Good afternoon. I am trying to internationalize my organization's dataverse but pt_PT for version 5.12.1 is too weak. How can I add more portuguese words, locally, to this version of translation file. After translation I intend to contribute to dataverse translation with the resulting file.

Thanks in advance,

content: @AdÃ­lia Isabel Domingues da Cruz Alves wonderful! Thank you! We'll look for the pull request! :tada:

Hi Adilia,
you can do so by editing the pt_PT .properties files from this repository and branch.
You can add missing items by comparing the en_US version of the property files and add the properties that are not in pt_PT property file and translate them. For example, there is no pt_PT equivalent for staticSearchFields.properties, and there might be keys in the files that are not there in portuguese.
Hope this helps :)
